resources.string: You can\'t add more than 5 items
Happiness is celebrating the small things every day
True wealth is measured by how much we can give to others.
Happiness is not something ready made. It comes from your own actions.
Kindness is a language which the deaf can hear and the blind can see.
Optimism is the faith that leads to achievement. Nothing can be done without hope and confidence.
Respect is not something that you can command; it is earned by how you act and the way you treat others.
